To play mahjong, you first need to recognize the tiles. There are 136 pieces in total, including 1-9 'tiao', 1-9 'wan', 1-9 'tong', red, green, white, east, south, west, north. Each tile has 4 pieces. The tiles are arranged in a row of 17 tiles, two rows up and down. Each person draws four tiles, takes turns drawing three times, the first person to draw skips two tiles, the other three each draw one tile, then flip a 'hun' (hun can replace any tile). 

There are several ways to win, such as having four sets of three identical tiles or sequences and a pair, or having a sequence from 1 to 9 and three identical tiles or a sequence and a pair, etc. There are also special winning hands like pairs dragon, catch five, catch three, and 13 unique. 

During the game, you can 'pung' when you have two identical tiles and someone else plays the same tile, or 'kong' when you have three identical tiles and you draw the same tile or someone else plays it. The 'hun' tile can replace any other tile to form a sequence or pair.

Sure, here's a brief guide on how to steam star grouper:

1. Clean the star grouper, remove the scales and internal organs. You can ask the fish stall owner to do this for you.

2. Slice some ginger and put it inside the fish belly and at the bottom of the fish. You can also add some on top of the fish.

3. Sprinkle a little MSG on the fish for flavor.

4. Place the fish in a steamer. When the water is boiling, steam the fish for about 10-12 minutes.

5. After steaming, remove the fish from the steamer and pour out the steam water. Remove the ginger slices.

6. Steam the fish again in the pot, pour in steamed fish soy sauce, and simmer for another 2 minutes.

7. Uncover the pot, remove the ginger slices, and add scallions on top of the fish.

8. Heat some oil until it's boiling, then pour it on the fish. 

9. Your steamed star grouper is now ready to serve. Enjoy!

If you still can't connect, you can try the following steps:

1. Unpair your AirPods from your phone's Bluetooth settings.
2. Hold the button on the AirPods case for 15 seconds to reset them.
3. Reconnect your AirPods via Bluetooth.

If this doesn't work, you can try connecting your iPhone to a power source before turning on the Bluetooth and attempting to connect the AirPods.

Another method is to ignore the device in your Bluetooth settings, plug in the charging cable, put the AirPods in the case, and press and hold the button on the back until a re-pairing pop-up appears. Don't connect at this point. Instead, close the lid and let the AirPods charge for at least 5 hours. After charging, open and close the lid, restart your phone, and then try to connect again.

If all these methods fail, it's recommended to contact Apple's technical support or consider returning the product to the factory.

Absolutely, here are some suggestions to help you prepare for the trial lecture:

1. Familiarize yourself with the textbook: This is the basis of all trial lectures. Understanding the content thoroughly will help you present it effectively.

2. Focus on a sub-item: Don't try to cover too much in your lecture. It's better to thoroughly explain a single sub-item.

3. Divide the content: Break down the sub-item into several knowledge points. This will help you organize your lecture and make it easier for the interviewers to follow.

4. Design teaching links: Each knowledge point should correspond to a teaching link. This will help you structure your lecture and ensure all points are covered.

5. Include a summary, homework, and closing remarks: This will give your lecture a clear beginning, middle, and end.

6. Practice: Practice your lecture in front of a mirror, record yourself, and watch the playback. This will help you identify any areas for improvement.

7. Watch trial lecture videos: This can give you a good idea of what is expected in a trial lecture.

8. Prepare for defense: Think about possible questions the examiners might ask about your lecture and prepare answers for them.

Remember, the key to a successful trial lecture is preparation and practice. Good luck!

To raise spiders in winter, you should:

1. Provide a warm environment: You can use a heating pad and place it on the side of the tank, not underneath, to avoid overheating. If you have a thermal insulation box, you can use it. 

2. Maintain humidity: Spiders drink water from the mat like coconut soil. Add water once every half a month, but don't make it too wet.

3. Feed them properly: Feed the spider twice a week, depending on its size. The prey, which can be mealworms or roaches, should be smaller than the spider.

4. Monitor temperature and humidity: Use a thermohygrometer to check the temperature and humidity inside the spider breeding environment. The temperature should be around 25-30 degrees and the humidity about 65%.

5. Provide a hiding place: Use tree bark or thicker branches for young spiders. Adult spiders can use dedicated hiding places for pets or anything they can get in.

6. Clean the environment: When the soil is infested with mites or moldy maggots, it needs to be changed.

Remember, spiders are poisonous and can bite under certain circumstances, so handle with care.

Based on the information provided, it seems that the specific steps for weaving small pendants with rope were not detailed. However, it was mentioned that Chinese knotting is a popular method for creating hand-woven crafts, including pendants. This technique involves using a single silk thread to weave different knots together, creating a unique and traditional Chinese decoration. Some popular Chinese knots include the double money knot, button knot, lute knot, and more. 

For a beginner, a simple knot like the button knot could be a good starting point. Here are the basic steps:

1. Cut a length of your chosen thread (cotton, hemp, or nylon).
2. Make a loop at one end of the thread.
3. Take the other end of the thread and pass it through the loop.
4. Pull the end of the thread to tighten the knot.
5. Repeat these steps to create multiple knots along the length of the thread.
6. Attach your pendant to the knotted thread.

Remember, practice makes perfect. Start with simple knots and gradually try more complex ones as you get more comfortable with the process.

Describing a kiss in a novel can be done in various ways, depending on the emotions and the context of the scene. Here are some examples:

1. "The body is instantly bound into a powerful embrace, the unfinished voice is drowned in a kiss full of affection. The slightly cold tongue slides into the mouth, greedily seizing her breath, forcefully exploring every corner. This moment's palpitation makes both forget everything around them."

2. "He lifted her flushed little face, his lips fell on her forehead, eyes, nose, and finally, unable to control himself, kissed the lips he had been longing for under the influence of alcohol."

3. "He held her tightly, one hand stroking her face, ignoring her slight struggle, one hand supporting her back to fix her in his arms, brought his lips up, the four petals of red lips tightly pressed together, she stopped struggling, staring at him who had closed his eyes as if enjoying, also closed her eyes, deepened this kiss."

4. "Slowly, slowly, he bent down, kissed her pale lips. She did not resist, just stood still, with an expression on her face that was either cold or shocked. He kissed her shallowly, gently kissing her lips, and then, explored deeper."

Sure, here are the detailed steps to fold an origami crane:

1. Start with a square piece of paper, colored side up. If you don't have one, you can cut a piece of candy wrapper into a square.

2. Fold the paper diagonally in half, corner to corner, then unfold.

3. Fold the paper diagonally the other way, then unfold. You should have an X crease on your paper.

4. Turn the paper over.

5. Fold the paper in half, edge to edge, then unfold.

6. Fold the paper in half the other way, then unfold. You should have a + crease intersecting the X crease.

7. Bring all corners of the model in to the center line. Fold the top triangle down, then unfold.

8. Open the uppermost flap of the model, bringing it upwards and pressing the sides of the model inwards at the same time. Flatten down, forming a square.

9. Fold both sides of the upper layer towards the middle line.

10. Fold the top of the model downwards, then unfold.

11. Open the uppermost flap of the model, bringing it upwards and pressing the sides of the model inwards at the same time. Flatten down.

12. Fold the model in half.

13. Fold both 'legs' of the model up, crease very well, then unfold.

14. Inside Reverse Fold each 'leg' along the creases you just made.

15. Inside Reverse Fold one side to make a head, then fold down the wings.

16. You have now completed the origami crane.

Remember, origami takes practice, so don't be discouraged if your first few attempts don't turn out perfectly. Keep trying and you'll get the hang of it!

To create a mountain model, you should follow these steps:

1. Stack the main mountain body with foam boards and foam blocks. Use white latex for bonding and let it dry.
2. Mix plaster powder with water to a thick consistency, dip a non-woven fabric (or facial tissue) into the plaster water and spread it on the mountain for shaping. Let it dry for 1-2 days.
3. Use acrylic paint or plasticine to color the mountain. Start with a layer of earth yellow, let it dry, then apply a second layer of gray + yellow plasticine.
4. Determine the scale of your model pieces by comparing vehicles of different sizes. For example, a 1:200 scale might be suitable.
5. Use a special model water maker to make a lake. Apply a layer of white latex evenly on the bottom of the lake, let it dry, then apply a layer of blue water maker, let it dry, and then apply a second layer of colorless water maker.
6. Use dark gray acrylic paint or plasticine to draw the road on the mountain. After drying, draw the traffic lines on it.
7. Apply model glue or white latex on the mountain, then sprinkle grass powder. Let the grass powder naturally stick to the mountain.
8. Install a pre-made bridge model on the mountain model and take care of the details at the connection.
9. Use the remaining dark gray paint to draw the tunnel and install 1:200 model trees and cars for decoration.

Remember, the base of the model is crucial for its stability, and the shaping cloth used for the mountain should overlap for firmness. The terrain is mainly based on contour lines to divide layers, cut each layer of board separately, and then stack them up. The denser the contour lines, the more realistic and beautiful the terrain.

When installing a secondary drainage pipe in the bathroom, you need to pay special attention to the following points:

3. The ground of the sunken layer needs to be sloped, so the place of the secondary drainage hole should be lower, and other places should be gradually raised.
4. If the waterproof layer of the sunken wall is damaged, it needs to be repaired, leveled, and then a waterproof layer is made on the leveled surface.
5. Be aware that if the secondary drainage work is not done well, it may cause the waterproofing of the sunken layer to fail, and it will cause leakage to the downstairs. The repair afterwards is relatively difficult and costly.

8. The drain pipe should be supported by bricks, not fixed cards, to avoid the risk of leakage.

To change the default disk to D drive on your Windows 10 system, follow these steps:

1. Change the desktop file save location: Create a new folder in the D drive named 'Desktop'. Then, open 'My Computer', find 'Desktop' in the left column, right-click, and select properties. In the properties, find the location, select move, and add the folder path of the new 'Desktop' folder you created in the D drive. Click confirm.

2. Change the default save location of the file: Press the win＋i keys to open system settings. Click on 'System', find 'Storage', select 'More Storage Settings', click 'Change the save location of new content', and then change all default positions to D drive. Click apply.

3. Open Storage Sense: Press the win＋i keys to open system settings. Click on 'System', select 'Storage', click 'Configure Storage Sense', select 'Open Storage Sense', set running storage sense to 'weekly', recycle bin set to '14 days', download folder set to 'never'. Then confirm.

4. Garbage cleaning: Use the %temp% and cleanmgr commands to clean up unnecessary files and free up space on your computer.

After these settings, your default disk will be changed to D drive.

Gum tumors are caused by several factors. One of the main causes is local inflammatory stimulation, such as a large amount of plaque and calculus deposited in the oral cavity, or food often embedded in the adjacent surfaces of the teeth. Another significant cause is hormone changes, for instance, hormone changes in young women after pregnancy may cause tumor-like proliferations on the gums. This type of gum tumor is specifically called a pregnancy tumor. Other factors like tartar attached between the gums and teeth, defective tooth roots, and poor restorations, which repeatedly stimulate the local gums, can also lead to gum tumors.

The character '故' has a left-right structure. The left side is the character '古' which is narrow, and the right side is wider. The final stroke should be the lowest and furthest to the right, and should not be written short. The positions of the two short horizontal lines are basically level, and the starting point of the short vertical is slightly high. The spacing between the three horizontal strokes at the bottom should be equal. The horizontal line in '古' is short, and the '口' is directly facing the upper vertical line. The horizontal stroke of '攵' starts at the bottom of the upper slant, and the lower slant starts at the left end of the short horizontal line; the slant ends in a dot. The tilt and length of the horizontal line in the character '古' are important, as is the crossing position of the crossing pen.

Excessive cooling of the body can disrupt the normal functioning of the body. It can lead to an imbalance in gastric acid secretion and disrupt the normal rhythm of intestinal movement, causing gastrointestinal discomfort. It can also cause the blood vessels of the gastrointestinal mucosa to contract, leading to ischemia and hypoxia of the gastrointestinal mucosa. This reduces nutrient supply, weakens the defense barrier of the gastrointestinal mucosa, and causes discomfort. Furthermore, excessive cooling can cause blood redistribution, reducing the blood supply to the stomach and intestines and decreasing their function. In the elderly, sudden drops in temperature can lead to increases in blood pressure, potentially causing stroke and cerebral thrombosis. It can also put a great burden on the heart, potentially inducing angina and, in severe cases, causing myocardial infarction.

The bitter components in ingredients can come from various sources. The alkaloid quinine in bitter melon also presents a bitter taste. Other foods like spinach contain oxalic acid, which gives it an astringent taste. Lettuce leaves are rich in bitter substances, and the stems and leaves of lettuce contain lactucin, which has a slightly bitter taste. Fresh lily's bitterness is caused by a component called colchicine. It's also not recommended to use P/NP for major courses.

The problems of electrical noise and poor contact in a microphone can be solved in several ways:

1. Ground the device shell through the wire, replace with well-shielded wire, or use an equalizer to cut off audio below 60Hz to deal with AC noise.
2. Use well-shielded twisted pair to deal with buzzing sound caused by poor shielding of the audio line.
3. Keep the amplifier away to avoid AC hum.
4. Use software to reduce noise or eliminate sizzling sound in post-processing, or use high-end pickups.
5. Use well-shielded shielding lines to deal with line induction.
6. Avoid placing mobile phones near the recording equipment to prevent mobile phone interference.
7. Keep the speaker and microphone away from the monitor to avoid monitor interference.
8. Temporarily turn off the monitor power during recording to avoid monitor line frequency crosstalk.
9. Change power supply or motherboard and other hardware to deal with host interference.
10. Avoid too high recording amplification gain and keep the sound source microphone at a proper distance to prevent distortion.

For the current sound of karaoke audio equipment, check the connection of the audio line from the ceiling speaker to the power amplifier and strengthen it if it's loose. Also, ensure that there are no unknown magnetic fields nearby that could interfere with wireless microphones, and keep the power supplies between the audio and the power amplifier at a distance to avoid interference.

Deep breathing can be done through two methods: Diaphragmatic breathing and 478 Breathing. 

For Diaphragmatic breathing, place one hand on your heart and the other on your abdomen. Breathe in through your nose, filling your abdomen with air. As you exhale, pull your belly button towards your spine. Repeat three to five times.

For 478 Breathing, breathe in for four seconds, hold your breath for seven seconds, then exhale for eight seconds. Start with one hand on your heart and the other on your abdomen. When you feel your diaphragm slide down, slowly inhale deeply from your abdomen. At the top, hold your breath and count to seven. Then exhale through your mouth, counting to eight. Completely empty your lungs. Repeat three to five times, or until you feel calm.

Another method is the 'Physiological Sigh'. This involves two short inhalations, followed by a long exhalation. Inhale with your nose, exhale with your mouth. Do 3-10 sets back and forth. This method can help open your stuck alveoli and suppress the sympathetic nerves to alleviate stress.

The resistance wire converts electrical energy into thermal energy through a process called resistive heating. When an electric current is passed through the wire, it encounters resistance, which causes it to do work. This work is transformed into heat energy, a process described by Joule's Law. The heat generated is directly proportional to the square of the current, the resistance of the wire, and the time the current is applied. This is how devices like electric heating plates work, using resistance wires or elements to generate heat.

To determine if you have placental chimerism, you would need to undergo specific genetic testing. With the advancement of genetic technologies such as chromosomal microarray analysis, non-invasive prenatal screening with high-throughput sequencing, and copy number variation sequencing, the detection of chromosomal mosaicism, including placental chimerism, has become more common. Integrated Pest Management (IPM) is a holistic and eco-friendly approach to pest risk management that uses a combination of techniques to minimize harm. It involves regular monitoring and identification of pests, good hygiene practices, use of physical barriers, quarantine procedures, and as a last resort, careful use of chemicals. The goal of IPM is to reduce the dependence on harmful pesticides, promote sustainable agricultural practices, and maintain healthy, high-yielding crops. It's particularly beneficial in fields like hydroponics and in general pest control management.

Yes, oxytocin does have potential side effects. If administered too quickly, it can cause the mother to have rigid and spasmodic uterine contractions, which can affect the birth of the fetus and cause heavy bleeding. It can also affect the oxygen supply, leading to fetal hypoxia. Additionally, oxytocin can increase the duration of uterine contractions and decrease the interval time between them. This can increase the woman's pain and adversely affect the blood circulation of the placenta, potentially causing acute intrauterine hypoxia for the fetus. In some cases, it can even lead to uterine rupture, which is dangerous for both mother and baby.

To use a dryer correctly, follow these steps:

1. Place the dryer in a well-ventilated and stable area, ensuring the air at the bottom of the machine can circulate normally. Avoid using it on carpets, sofas, quilts, clothes, or other cloth items.

2. Avoid letting a large amount of water enter the inside of the machine body as it can damage the circuit board. If cleaning is needed, wipe the inside with a wet tissue and then turn on the machine for disinfection.

3. Dehydrate clothes before drying. High water content can affect the drying effect.

4. Sort clothes during drying. Avoid drying clothes of different thickness and dampness together. 

5. Use timed drying for small clothes. For thick and special fabric materials, you can choose timed drying to adjust the drying time.

6. Turn over easily pilling, fleece clothes for drying. For clothes with zippers, ribbons, pull up the zipper, tie the ribbon.

7. Do not exceed the program load.

8. Clean the lint filter before and after use to maintain drying efficiency.

9. Do not mix women's underwear with other clothes for drying. Use a dryer with an underwear drying function if possible.

10. Do not open the door before the drying program ends to avoid burns.

Mink fur production is a complex process. It begins with the cutting of the fur, which is a key step. The cutter needs to calculate and arrange reasonably, cut the fur open, and make it deform as a whole. The process also involves craft technology, which varies depending on the company and the specific product being made. Some processes require mink fur at the velvet level, wearing mink fur and sheared mink fur woven together, with a rich sense of hierarchy. The cutting of fur clothing is different from the cutting of ordinary woven clothing. Due to the rarity of fur materials, it cannot be cut directly according to the paper pattern like the cutting of ordinary woven fabrics. Instead, it needs to be cut during the matching process to achieve the required length of the garment piece, while ensuring that the hair on the entire garment is even.

The side effects of teeth correction include:

1. Dental mask face: This can occur due to muscle atrophy from not being able to chew normally with braces. 

2. Black triangle: This can happen due to gum atrophy or gaps between teeth.

3. Tooth demineralization and white spots: This can occur due to poor oral hygiene during the correction process.

4. Root absorption: This can happen due to issues with the orthodontic plan design or lack of proper communication with the doctor during the correction process.

These side effects can be managed and prevented with proper care, good oral hygiene, and regular follow-ups with the orthodontist.

Yes, a secondary vocational graduation certificate is a diploma issued by the school after students have completed three or four years of study. It is mainly dark blue in appearance, with the words "diploma" printed on the cover, and the name and emblem of the school printed in the lower left corner. The inside pages include personal information, major name, study period, graduation time, exam results, etc. This certificate is nationally recognized and can be used for job hunting, further studies, certification examinations, etc. The Central Radio and Television Secondary Vocational School and the Shanghai TV Secondary Vocational are examples of institutions that issue these certificates.

To get to the mother tree of Wuyi Mountain Da Hong Pao, you can enter from either the north or south entrance of the scenic area. If you enter from the north entrance, you can see the mother tree on the cliff in about half an hour. If you enter from the south entrance and follow the trail, it will take at least four hours to reach the mother tree. If you buy a ticket for the scenic spot sightseeing car, you can take the car directly from Wuyi Palace or North Second Road to the Da Hong Pao scenic area, and then walk up to Tianxin Yongle Zen Temple. From there, walk a short distance to see the entrance of Da Hong Pao station. Follow the inside to Ruyi Pavilion and there is a fork in the road to go to the reverse pit and cattle pen pit on the right.

To change the background in Premiere, you can use the Ultra Key effect. First, ensure the layer you want to crop is on top. Then, select the 'Ultra Key' effect from the toolbar and drag it to your video clip. In the effect control panel, select the color you want to crop. If you're working with a video that has a strong contrast between the subject and background, you can use tools like "Brightness Key", "Color Key", "Difference Mask", "Cropping-CC Sample(erase wire)", "Real Scene Cropping-Roto Brush", and "keying-keylight". After cropping, you can replace the background with your desired image or video.

Sure, based on the information provided, here's a simple method to measure if you have a high skull top:

1. Look at the proportion: Measure the distance from your hairline to the top of your head, and then measure the distance from your hairline to your eyebrows. If these two distances are approximately equal, you likely have a high skull top.

2. Look at face shape: The shape of your face can also influence whether a high skull top suits you. 

3. Look at features: Your other facial features also play a role in determining whether a high skull top is suitable for you.

Remember, this is a general guideline and individual results may vary. It's always best to consult with a professional if you're unsure.
